definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: And when I stopped by at a convenience store in Nagoya, I found this.
sentences.chinese: 当我顺路去名古屋的便利店时，我找到了这个。

sentences.english: Ensure non-fuel business merchandising in convenient store of service station.
sentences.chinese: 确保加油站便利店非油品产品的供应。

sentences.english: He's the manager of the convenience store next door.
sentences.chinese: 他是这附近便利店的店长吧。

sentences.english: Have you ever bought snacks or drinks in the Convenience Store of Orchid Canteen?
sentences.chinese: 您曾到过兰苑食堂的便利店买零食或者饮料吗？

sentences.english: Buy stamps from stores such as Superdrug.
sentences.chinese: 从诸如Superdrug的便利店买邮票。

sentences.english: I showed her the wine I'd bought at the 7-Eleven.
sentences.chinese: 我拿出自己在七仔便利店购买的那瓶葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Convenient stores and small shops are in some stations, lined up just outside the turnstiles.
sentences.chinese: 一些地铁站有便利店和小商店，就在出入闸机外面。

sentences.english: Convenience stores, Zhong Xian and armed to eat instant noodles.
sentences.chinese: 便利店里，钟贤和陆海空吃泡面。

sentences.english: The company is particularly strong in convenience stores, where Davidoff products are seldom sold.
sentences.chinese: 在便利店内，该公司的业务销售强劲，而在这里大。

sentences.english: Some chocolate-covered ants I found at the deli .
sentences.chinese: 又及，请同时查收一些我在便利店找到的巧克力蚂蚁。

sentences.english: Steal from a grocery store then you belong with the group.
sentences.chinese: 只要从便利店里偷东西，你就可以属于这个组织了。

sentences.english: PS. Please find enclosed some chocolate-covered ants I found at the deli .
sentences.chinese: 又及，请同时查收一些我在便利店找到的巧克力蚂蚁。

sentences.english: I sell appliances of fishing & camping in my convenience store.
sentences.chinese: 我在便利店里销售钓鱼和野营用具。

sentences.english: I stop at a convenience store on my way home.
sentences.chinese: 我回家途中顺便去便利店。

sentences.english: The article introduces the development course and the experience of KEDI convenient store.
sentences.chinese: 便利店创新所走过的历程和体验。

definition: supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
fresh produce and freshly prepared foods
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
kiosk/snack counter/retail department or section inside a larger business
